result.name: road-accident-in-depth-studies-raids
result.notes: This asset contains legacy data from the Department's OTS, CCIS and HVCIS accident studies. It contains measurements taken at the scene of accidents, damage to vehicles, injuries to persons involved in the accidents and the investigators conclusions of the investigations. Data collection will begin again towards the end of 2012 under the RAIDS project. The data entered in the database is anonymised on entry and contains no information that directly identifies an individual.

organization.name: department-for-transport
organization.title: Department for Transport
organization.description:
We work with our agencies and partners to support the transport network that helps the UK’s businesses and gets people and goods travelling around the country. We plan and invest in transport infrastructure to keep the UK on the move.

DFT is a ministerial department, supported by 22 agencies and public bodies.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/department-for-transport

result.title: Road Accident In Depth Studies (RAIDS)
